This is the course website for [BEE](https://cals.cornell.edu/biological-environmental-engineering) 4750/5750 at [Cornell University](https://cornell.edu). This course focuses on probabilistic modeling of environmental data-generating processes, including simulation methods and model evaluation and selection.
